data.comment: The match has started.
Throw-in for Nashville at Mapfre Stadium.
In the minute 1, Can Columbus get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nashville's half?
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Columbus.
Columbus awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 4, Silviu Petrescu awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Columbus is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nashville awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 8, Columbus advance rapidly upfield but Silviu Petrescu blows for offside.
Throw-in for Columbus in their own half.
Free kick Nashville.
In the minute 10, Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Columbus in their own half.
Throw-in for Columbus in the half of Nashville.
Can Columbus capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nashville's half?
In the minute 13, Columbus's Harrison Afful is whistled for offside at Mapfre Stadium.
Throw-in Columbus.
Dominique Badji for Nashville gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 14, It's a goal kick for the home team in Columbus.
Free kick for Columbus in the half of Nashville.
Goal kick for Nashville at Mapfre Stadium.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Nashville at Mapfre Stadium.
Silviu Petrescu awards the home team a throw-in.
Nashville have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 21, Free kick for Columbus in their own half.
Silviu Petrescu signals a Columbus throw-in in Nashville's half.
Columbus's Gyasi Zardes misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 23, Silviu Petrescu awards Nashville a goal kick.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Nashville in their own half.
Ball safe as Columbus is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 25, In Columbus a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Nashville are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Fatai Alashe is booked for the home team.
In the minute 28, Free kick Nashville.
Anibal Godoy (Nashville) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Pedro Santos (Columbus) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 29, Nashville to take a throw-in in Columbus territory.
Throw-in for Columbus in their own half.
Columbus awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 31, Nashville are pushing forward but Hany Mukhtar's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Columbus goal kick.
Nashville awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 35, Throw-in Columbus.
Free kick for Columbus in their own half.
Columbus's Luis Diaz gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 36, Nashville have a goal kick.
Free kick for Columbus in the half of Nashville.
At Mapfre Stadium, Daniel Lovitz has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 38, Columbus are caught offside.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Nashville.
Columbus are coming forward and Milton Valenzuela gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 41, Ball goes out of play for a Nashville goal kick.
Throw-in for Columbus at Mapfre Stadium.
In Columbus Nashville attack through Alan Winn. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 42, Silviu Petrescu awards Columbus a goal kick.
Silviu Petrescu signals a throw-in for Columbus, close to Nashville's area.
Nashville needs to be cautious. Columbus have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 43, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Columbus get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nashville's half?
Nashville have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, At Mapfre Stadium the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Columbus.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Nashville in their own half.
The first-half is over at Mapfre Stadium.
The second-half is underway at Mapfre Stadium.
In the minute 46, In Columbus a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Nashville awarded a free kick in their own half.
Silviu Petrescu signals a Nashville throw-in in Columbus's half.
In the minute 49, Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Columbus in their own half.
Throw-in for Nashville in the half of Columbus.
Silviu Petrescu awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 50, Pedro Santos is on target to give Columbus a 1-0 advantage.
Gyasi Zardes with an assist there.
Throw-in Columbus.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Columbus in their own half.
Free kick for Nashville in their own half.
Nashville awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 57, Aboubacar Keita (Columbus) gets a yellow card.
Ball safe as Columbus is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Nashville in their own half.
In the minute 60, Luis Diaz (Columbus) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Columbus.
Alex Muyl for Nashville drives towards goal at Mapfre Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 62, Columbus awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nashville awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The away team have replaced Alan Winn with Daniel Rios. This is the first substitution made today by Gary Smith.
In the minute 65, Free kick for Columbus in their own half.
Free kick Columbus.
Nashville have been awarded a corner by Silviu Petrescu.
In the minute 68, Free kick for Nashville in the half of Columbus.
Nashville's Hany Mukhtar breaks free at Mapfre Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Columbus at Mapfre Stadium.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Columbus.
In the minute 70, Caleb Porter is making the team's first substitution at Mapfre Stadium with Lucas Zelarrayan replacing Youness Mokhtar.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Columbus just outside Nashville's area.
In the minute 71, Nashville's Alex Muyl has been booked in Columbus.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Nashville in their own half.
Throw-in for Columbus at Mapfre Stadium.
In the minute 74, Nashville to take a throw-in in Columbus territory.
Can Columbus capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Anibal Godoy (Nashville) has received a yellow card from Silviu Petrescu.
In the minute 76, Derrick Etienne is on a sub for Luis Diaz for Columbus.
Columbus have been awarded a corner by Silviu Petrescu.
Nashville awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Nashville in their own half.
In the minute 78, Taylor Washington is replacing Alex Muyl for Nashville at Mapfre Stadium.
In the minute 79, Columbus awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Nashville in Columbus.
Nashville make their third substitution with Derrick Jones replacing Anibal Godoy.
Nashville surge into the attack at Mapfre Stadium but Dominique Badji’s header is off-target.
In the minute 80, Ball goes out of play for a Columbus goal kick.
Throw-in for Columbus close to the penalty box.
Dominique Badji of Nashville gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 82, Silviu Petrescu awards Columbus a goal kick.
Dominique Badji (Nashville) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Columbus.
In the minute 83, Columbus to take a throw-in in Nashville territory.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Nashville in their own half.
Can Nashville get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Columbus's half?
In the minute 86, In Columbus Nashville drive forward through Walker Zimmerman. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In Columbus a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Nashville in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Nashville's Taylor Washington gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Columbus at Mapfre Stadium.
Silviu Petrescu will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Nashville have a dangerous throw-in.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-0.
Caleb Porter (Columbus) is making a third substitution, with Hector Jimenez replacing Pedro Santos.
Columbus take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Gyasi Zardes.
Artur instrumental with a fine assist.
